item.title: This Week in Music (TWiM)
item.description: I love listening to concerts, but it’s often tough to find bands playing in time to buy tickets, let alone decide if I think it’s worth it to spend my time and money to go and support new artists. So I built TWiM, a tool that finds concerts and builds playlists for them automatically. Fortunately for me, there are plenty of city-specific websites that have info on upcoming concerts! My idea was simple: write a program that would load the artists for the next week and make a Spotify playlist using spotipy. Easy enough, right?
